name: PHFetchOptions
desc: A set of options that affect the filtering, sorting, and management of results that Photos returns when you fetch asset or collection objects.

items.name: var predicate: NSPredicate?
items.desc: A predicate that specifies which properties to select results by and that also specifies any constraints on selection.

items.name: var sortDescriptors: [NSSortDescriptor]?
items.desc: A list of sort descriptors, specifying an order for the fetched objects.

items.name: var wantsIncrementalChangeDetails: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether your app receives detailed change information for the objects in the fetch result.

items.name: var fetchLimit: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of objects to include in the fetch result.

items.name: var includeAllBurstAssets: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the fetch result includes all assets from burst photo sequences.

items.name: var includeHiddenAssets: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the fetch result includes assets marked as hidden.

items.name: var includeAssetSourceTypes: PHAssetSourceType
items.desc: The set of source types for which to include assets in the fetch result.
